entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 p.m. NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with drizzle in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 in the Canada Bay area overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
